des:
Use the LP Control skill for Alexa to enable simple voice commands that allow your bed to adapt to your comfort needs without the inconvenience of bright phone screens or hard to find remote buttons. You can control your Alexa-enabled Leggett & Platt adjustable bed's position, lighting and massage features. The LP Control mobile app for iOS and Android can help you create your Leggett & Platt account and connect your bed with Alexa.

Once setup is complete you will be able to use the following Alexa commands. 

To adjust your bed to the flat position, say:
"Alexa, set the bed position to flat"

To adjust your bed's massage settings to high, say:
"Alexa, set the massage level to high"

To turn on your bed's light, say:
"Alexa, turn on the bed lights"
